title: 63-year-old railway worker dies after being run over by train

description: Azerbaijan and Georgia will discuss prospects of expanding economic cooperation between the two countries.

author: DFWatch staff
description: TBILISI, DFWatch–Two months after promising to build a new road to Tusheti, Prime Minister Giorgi Kvirikashvili now suggests building an air strip in the inaccessible region in the northeast of the country. It’s an attractive tourist destination, but […]
title: First road, now airport – PM promises to develop mountain region Tusheti

description: NATO defence ministers discussed progress in strengthening NATO's presence in Black Sea region.

author: DFWatch staff
description: Tbilisi, DFWatch – The Georgian president pardoned 168 prisoners, 114 of them will leave jail today, while the rest had their sentences reduced, the commission’s head, Zviad Koridze, stated at a briefing on Thursday. Six […]
title: 168 prisoners pardoned in Georgia

description: NBG plans to gradually reduce key rate to 6% in the following two quarters.

description: 'No merger of ministries from the government's economic bloc is planned,' Kvirikashvili said.
title: PM Says Minor Changes Possible in Government Structure

author: DFWatch staff
description: TBILISI, DFWatch–A lawyer working for Georgian Manganese was arrested for corruption on Tuesday. Mirian Bichikashvili is accused of commercial bribery, the Finance Ministry said. Georgian Manganese owns mines in the small town of Chiatura […]
title: Georgian Manganese lawyer arrested on corruption charges

author: DFWatch staff
description: TBILISI, DFWatch–Georgian Railways is considering creating a new train line connecting the airports in Tbilisi and Kutaisi, with regular departures. Spokesperson Dachi Tsaguria told Kutaisi Post that Georgian Railways is currently researching whether the […]
title: Georgian Railways considering Tbilisi-Kutaisi airport train

author: DFWatch staff
description: TBILISI, DFWatch–Several key figures in Irakli Alasania’s Free Democrats party have expressed support for the ruling Georgian Dream before the second round of the parliamentary elections in most majoritarian districts. “In a few days, there […]
title: Free Democrats rebels vow to support GD in second round of election

author: DFWatch staff
description: TBILISI, DFWatch–A key mountain road that connects north and south Caucasus is now closed for large vehicles because of snow and ice.  Trailers, semi-trailers and vehicles with more than 30 seats are prohibited from driving on […]
title: Caucasus mountain road closed in north Georgia due to snow and ice

author: DFWatch staff
description: TBILISI, DFWatch–Two men died in a car accident in a mountainous area in the southwest of Georgia on Monday. One woman survived and was taken to hospital. The accident happened in Keda, a municipality […]
title: Two die as car plunges into river in southwest Georgia

description: If you want to know what it s like to be living in an area where a border moves daily and one morning you might find your house and garden on different sides of the boundary go no further than an article published by the New York Times
title: New York Times: “In Russia’s ‘Frozen Zone,’ a Creeping Border With Georgia”

description: Today the United Nations Population Fund UNFPA released its State of World Population Report 2016 addressing the challenges facing young females worldwide with a focus on 10 year old girls
